title: WebSocketSubjectConfig
contents:
mode_edit code
API / rxjs/webSocket

WebSocketSubjectConfiglink

WebSocketSubjectConfig 是一個普通的物件，它可以讓我們的 webSocket 變成可設定的。

WebSocketSubjectConfig is a plain Object that allows us to make our webSocket configurable.

為 webSocket 提供靈活性

Provides flexibility to webSocket

它定義了一組屬性以在 Socket 生命週期的特定時刻提供自定義行為。當連線開啟時我們可以使用 openObserver，當連線關閉時使用 closeObserver，如果我們有興趣監聽來自伺服器的資料，則用 deserializer，它允許我們在將資料傳給 Socket 用戶端之前自定義資料的反序列化策略。預設情況下，deserializer 會用 JSON.parse 解析來自伺服器的每條訊息。

It defines a set of properties to provide custom behavior in specific moments of the socket's lifecycle. When the connection opens we can use openObserver, when the connection is closed closeObserver, if we are interested in listening for data coming from server: deserializer, which allows us to customize the deserialization strategy of data before passing it to the socket client. By default, deserializer is going to apply JSON.parse to each message coming from the Server.

例子link

Exampleslink

deserializer（反序列化器），此屬性的預設值為 JSON.parse，但由於傳入資料只有兩個選項：文字或二進位資料。我們可以自定義反序列化策略，或者只是跳過預設行為。

deserializer, the default for this property is JSON.parse but since there are just two options for incoming data, either be text or binarydata. We can apply a custom deserialization strategy or just simply skip the default behaviour.

import { webSocket } from 'rxjs/webSocket'; const wsSubject = webSocket({ url: 'ws://localhost:8081', //Apply any transformation of your choice. deserializer: ({ data }) => data }); wsSubject.subscribe(console.log); // Let's suppose we have this on the Server: ws.send('This is a msg from the server') //output // // This is a msg from the server

serializer（序列化器）允許我們應用自定義的序列化策略，不過這裡是用於傳出訊息。

serializer allows us to apply custom serialization strategy but for the outgoing messages.

import { webSocket } from 'rxjs/webSocket'; const wsSubject = webSocket({ url: 'ws://localhost:8081', // Apply any transformation of your choice. serializer: msg => JSON.stringify({ channel: 'webDevelopment', msg: msg }) }); wsSubject.subscribe(() => subject.next('msg to the server')); // Let's suppose we have this on the Server: // ws.on('message', msg => console.log); // ws.send('This is a msg from the server'); // output at server side: // // {"channel":"webDevelopment","msg":"msg to the server"}

closeObserver（關閉 Observer）允許我們在出現錯誤時設定自定義錯誤。

closeObserver allows us to set a custom error when an error raises up.

import { webSocket } from 'rxjs/webSocket'; const wsSubject = webSocket({ url: 'ws://localhost:8081', closeObserver: { next() { const customError = { code: 6666, reason: 'Custom evil reason' } console.log(`code: ${ customError.code }, reason: ${ customError.reason }`); } } }); // output // code: 6666, reason: Custom evil reason

openObserver（開啟 Observer），假設我們需要在向 webSocket 傳送/接收訊息或傳送連線成功的通知之前進行某種初始化任務，這就是 openObserver 的用武之地。

openObserver, Let's say we need to make some kind of init task before sending/receiving msgs to the webSocket or sending notification that the connection was successful, this is when openObserver is useful for.

import { webSocket } from 'rxjs/webSocket'; const wsSubject = webSocket({ url: 'ws://localhost:8081', openObserver: { next: () => { console.log('Connection ok'); } } }); // output // Connection ok

interface WebSocketSubjectConfig<T> { url: string protocol?: string | Array<string> resultSelector?: (e: MessageEvent) => T serializer?: (value: T) => WebSocketMessage deserializer?: (e: MessageEvent) => T openObserver?: NextObserver<Event> closeObserver?: NextObserver<CloseEvent> closingObserver?: NextObserver<void> WebSocketCtor?: {...} binaryType?: 'blob' | 'arraybuffer' }

屬性link

屬性型別說明
url

要連線的 Socket 伺服器的 url

The url of the socket server to connect to
protocol

用於連線的協定

The protocol to use to connect
resultSelector
serializer

用於在將訊息傳送到伺服器之前從傳遞的值建立訊息的序列化器。預設為 JSON.stringify。

A serializer used to create messages from passed values before the messages are sent to the server. Defaults to JSON.stringify.
deserializer

用於處理從伺服器抵達 Socket 的訊息的反序列化器。預設為 JSON.parse。

A deserializer used for messages arriving on the socket from the server. Defaults to JSON.parse.
openObserver

一個 Observer，當底層 Web Socket 上發生 open 事件時進行觀察。

An Observer that watches when open events occur on the underlying web socket.
closeObserver

一個 Observer，當底層 Web Socket 上發生 close 事件時進行觀察

An Observer that watches when close events occur on the underlying web socket
closingObserver

一個 Observer，當由於退訂而即將發生關閉時進行觀察。

An Observer that watches when a close is about to occur due to unsubscription.
WebSocketCtor

要使用的 WebSocket 建構式函式。這對於在 Node 中使用 WebSocket 實現（WebSocket 是一種 DOM API）或模擬 WebSocket 以進行測試等情況很有用

A WebSocket constructor to use. This is useful for situations like using a WebSocket impl in Node (WebSocket is a DOM API), or for mocking a WebSocket for testing purposes
binaryType

設定底層 WebSocket 的 binaryType 屬性。

Sets the binaryType property of the underlying WebSocket.
